Text: Can update this to v1.5.8? Thanks.

Works flawlessly, but in order to get the crack to copy to folder, one must go to the start menu and type "msconfig' go to startup and click "hide microsoft" and disable the rest, preferably the one that says "cleanmypc..." Enjoy..

If you want a quick and easy crack just rename the installed "CleanMyPC" to something else and drag in the cracked version and you're set! 

Thanks to the uploader! :D
